careteam.notes: Member states she is doing pretty well, has an appt. on 1/4/2015 for ov with Dr. Zloto, states she has hx. of falls, fell in France 4 yrs ago, fell in Wisconsin 3 yrs ago and another fall in her backyard about 6 months ago in which she injured her arm but states no broken bones, feels that the forteo helped her. She no longer is on that medication, takes prolia injections once every 6 months. She states she has minor aches and pains and may on occasion take an advil for pain but states not often as she doesn't like to take anything unless she absolutely has to. States she has 4 dtrs and they are all nurses, all are in Florida and she and spouse have much support. She denies any health concerns or issues at this time.

conditions: Diabetes Mellitus Type 2 w/ Neurological Manifestations

careteam.notes:
DIAGNOSES:
- Osteoarthritis of Knee
- Lower Back Pain
- Diabetes Mellitus Type 2 with Neurological Manifestations
- Hyperlipidemia
- Essential Hypertension
- Hypothyroidism
- Chronic Kidney Disease Stage 4
- Moderate Smoker (20 or less per day)
- Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
- Mixed Anxiety and Depressive Disorder
PLAN:
- Return to the clinic in 1 month regarding pain management.
- Also keep her regular scheduled appointment.
- Be signed up for CareSync.
PROCEDURES TO BE SCHEDULED:
- Cognitive test regarding mild cognitive impairment.
- Tonometry regarding preglaucoma.
- Balance test regarding gait disturbance.
PROCEDURES TO BE DONE TODAY:
- Blood glucose check regarding diabetes mellitus.
- Urine toxicology.
IMAGE ORDERS:
- Mammogram regarding screen. - DEXA scan regarding screen.
REFERRAL:
- Dr. Levine regarding a colonoscopy.
MEDICATIONS:
- Amitriptyline 100 mg take 1 tablet at bedtime daily.
- Oxycodone/Acetaminophen 5-325 mg take 1 tablet every 4 hours as needed.
